page.title: 19Transport
page.content: {The A12.}I went to the A12 to count how many cars go along in 25 minutes. I thought there were 100 cars a day but there were 104 in 25 minutes. I was very surprised because there was only one motorbike, one coach and 2 buses. I saw 3 lorries on the A12 all at the same time and 6 cars at the same time. The A12 goes from London to Great Yarmouth and I use the A12 as well. On weekdays there are lots of cars and vans rushing to work. On Sunday there is less traffic because shops are not open. The surface is made of concrete and there were 2 lanes in each direction. {The Street. }This was the old A12 but now is part of the network of minor roads which connects Hatfield Peverel with surrounding villages. The hourly {Bus Service}connects the village with Chelmsford, Witham and Maldon.
